pr_title: [Java][Native]Add option to use the builder pattern for API parameters

timeline.author: jfeltesse-mdsol

replies.bodyText: It may add extra empty line for {{^vendorExtensions.x-group-parameters}}case
replies.author: bgong-mdsol

replies.bodyText: IMHO having an extra empty line in auto generated source code is alright if it can make the maintenance easier. Also, I don't know how about the java clients but the ruby one has the option to run a linter afterwards to take care of such things.
replies.author: jfeltesse-mdsol

replies.bodyText: It won't result in empty lines if the start tag and end tag are aligned properly. Ref: https://github.com/samskivert/jmustache#newline-trimming
replies.author: wing328

timeline.bodyText: do both {{/vend.. and {{#ven.. need to be on the same line?
timeline.author: jfeltesse-mdsol
